DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose is to investigate whether the addition of sodium valproate will be superior to treatment with quetiapine (Seroquel) given as monotherapy for an additional 14 days in non-responding patients after a 14 day initial treatment period with quetiapine. PLEASE NOTE: Seroquel SR and Seroquel XR refer to the same formulation. The SR designation was changed to XR after consultation with FDA.
DOC.brief_title: Seroquel in Acute Mania: Study to Investigate if Valproate Add-On Therapy is Superior to Quetiapine Monotherapy in Acutely Manic Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients suffering from a manic or mixed episode. Patients who have not provided personal informed consent, Known intolerance, hypersensitivity or lack of antimanic response to sodium valproate or quetiapine fumarate, Involuntary admittance/detainment.
